script: Summary Document This document summarizes the skills, experience, and education of Armand Junior Dongmo Notue, a Data Scientist with expertise in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP, Reinforcement Learning, and AI. Key Skills and Expertise: Armand has demonstrated expertise in developing real-time AI solutions, deploying ML pipelines, and optimizing predictive models to drive business impact. His skills include: NLP: Text Analytics, Sentiment Analysis, Speech-to-Text, Word Embeddings Cloud Computing: MLOps, AWS SageMaker, Docker, Kubernetes Transformer-Based NLP Model for Sentiment Analysis: Achieved 88.3 accuracy in sentiment monitoring Real-Time Fraud Detection System: Increased fraud detection accuracy by 35 Education and Certifications: Armand is currently pursuing a Master's degree in Data Science from Grand Canyon University. He has also completed various certifications, including: Google Data Analytics Professional Certificate (2024) * Deep learning specialization
